summary.para: Note This component is available for use in the Microsoft Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003 operating systems. It may be altered or unavailable in subsequent versions. The ReadyState property retrieves the ReadyState of the MSWebDVD object.

remarks.para: This property is read-only with no default value.
Returns an integer value representing the control's ReadyState.
Any object embedded in a Web page exposes the ReadyState property.

summary.para: Object is interactive, but not all its data is available.
Object has received all its data.
